title: No Lose Lottery Campaign
content:
JUL
1
No-Lose Lottery Campaign
Public
·
Created by
Sheyda
Tue, Jul 1 7:25 PM → Wed, Dec 31 5:00 AM
13
No-Lose Lottery Campaign: Earn Points, Win Rewards
We are excited to launch the No-Lose Lottery campaign, designed to reward our active and engaged community. As part of this initiative, you will earn points through your participation in the Hyperion Forum, and those points will give you entries into a biweekly lottery. The more you engage, the higher your chances of winning.
The campaign started 2 weeks ago on Jul 1st, and the first draw has been recorded and will be shared soon.
Start Date: July 1st, 2025
Duration: Ongoing, with new winners selected every 2 weeks
Total Winners per Round: 3
2 small prizes
1 grand prize
Winners will receive badge that can be swapped for METIS rewards on Hyperion mainnet:
1- Visionary Badge (Top Tier) Gold
Awarded to the Grand Winner of the No-Lose Lottery biweekly draw.
2- Contributor Badge (Low tier) Bronze
Awarded to the 2 Small Reward Winners of the No-Lose Lottery biweekly draw.
In the No-Lose Lottery, every 10 points you accumulate gives you one chance to win. Even if you only earn 1 chance (by collecting 10 points), you’re still eligible to participate and could win! The best part? No matter how many chances you have, you’re always in the game; it’s a true no-lose situation!
Winner Selection
Winners will be randomly selected from all eligible entries.
The selection process will be recorded and shared publicly on the Forum to ensure transparency.
Winners will receive exclusive badges, which will be redeemable for METIS tokens once the mainnet is live.
How to Participate
Earn Points: Engage in discussions, post helpful content, and interact with others in the Hyperion Forum to accumulate points.
Get Entries: Each 10 points earned will give you one entry into the lottery.
Leaderboards: Check here
Current No-Lose Period: View the ongoing lottery for the current period.
Overall Totals: Track your progress and compare your points with others in the community.
Both leaderboards will be displayed on the right panel of the Forum.
Once the leaderboard is live we’ll announce on Metis L2 X account with a live link.
Start participating today, earn points, and stand a chance to win. The No-Lose Lottery is all about recognizing and rewarding our dedicated community members. Keep engaging and contributing to the Hyperion Forum.
Congrats to the first No-Lose Lottery draw winners- July 14:
Grand prize: @Gann
Small prize: @Diapa and @arbilearn
Congrats to the second No-Lose Lottery draw winners- July 28:
Grand prize: @4ngle
Small prize: @gokkull_15 and @arbilearn

title: Why Lazbubu is More Than Just a Companion
content:
In Elena’s latest update, one theme is clear: participation should be simple, meaningful, and rewarding. Lazbubu DAT is a living example of this approach.
It is not just a static NFT. Lazbubu is an AI companion that evolves with every interaction. Your choices shape it, your data anchors it, and over time, your Lazbubu grows into something uniquely yours. This is playability in action.
By starting small, minting a Lazbubu, you take the first step into the Metis economy where AI, data, and engagement build real value.
If you have already minted your Lazbubu, how has your experience been?
What types of quests or redeem code rewards would you like to see next?
Join the live quest and earn a chance to receive a Lazbubu DAT redeem code: Quest link
By sharing your thoughts and feedback, you can collect points for the No-Lose Lottery. Every reply = 2 points toward the next biweekly draw.

title: Dogex: Simplified Decentralized Perpetuals DEX on Hyperion
content:
Dogex — The Easiest Way to Start Trading Perpetual Futures with AI.
Links: doge-ex.com
Twitter: https://x.com/DogexPerps
CEO Twitter with 30 days challenge to make DOGEX: https://x.com/mr_wagmi_cto
Video tutorial: https://youtu.be/4Wjm_cblm_Y
Vision:
Pitch FUTURE vision - https://youtu.be/0iTfrZa1XvU
Plans White Paper - Notion
Presentation - https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1FMCItBUjbN_Yr7yD4bMiGLszgZCjsZQ7wPelGRJ4N8w/edit?usp=sharing
Repos:
https://github.com/wagmiCTO/dogex-interface
https://github.com/wagmiCTO/dogex-alith-ai
https://github.com/wagmiCTO/dogex-contracts
https://github.com/wagmiCTO/dogex-liquidator-public
https://github.com/wagmiCTO/price-oracle-public
Problem
Most decentralized perpetual exchanges are overloaded with complex interfaces, confusing mechanics, and steep learning curves that push away new and retail traders. It’s hard not just to use the platform, but also to understand how perp trading works and choose a strategy.
Dogex solves this with an AI-powered, user-friendly platform on Hyperion — featuring a smart assistant, autotrading and simple tools for beginners.
Dogex’s mission
Dogex is not just another perp exchange. It’s the gateway to DeFi for the next generation of traders.
Dogex NOW:
Simplicity
A clean, minimal interface focused on what matters: quick position entry and exit, clear margin information, real-time updates. Fully mobile-compatible and beginner-friendly.
Speed and Scalability
Hyperion’s parallel transaction architecture ensures ultra-low latency and near-instant order execution. It delivers a user experience comparable to centralized exchanges while remaining fully decentralized.
High Leverage and 1-Minute Charts
Dogex offers high leverage and access to 1-minute timeframes. This enables users to:
Make more trades in shorter periods
Quickly understand market dynamics
Learn by doing in real trading conditions
Avoid long waiting periods associated with daily or weekly timeframes
The platform encourages active trading and accelerates the learning process.
Onchain AI Assistant
An integrated onchain AI system monitors positions, provides real-time risk analysis, and offers smart suggestions. It’s especially useful for beginners, helping them avoid liquidations and learn position management on the go.
Dogex FUTURE Vision:
Revolutionizing Trading with AI and Community Power
Perps Onboarding for Beginners: Our AI Vibe Trader don’t just teach theory — it guided users through real, hands-on trading strategies step-by-step, ensuring newcomers build true mastery from day one.
Seamless Auto-Strategies with Full Control: Hit a button and let smart auto-strategies work for you — but stay in the driver’s seat. This is not magic, it’s the second step in your trading journey, designed to teach and empower, not replace.
Intelligent AI Trading Assistant: Pick your strategy, analyze market conditions, and get real-time insights and trade support. Our AI assistant is your personal trading partner, adapting to your style and goals.
Decentralized, Community-Driven Platform: Governance, fees, and liquidity are powered by users — from rookies to pros. Higher liquidity means more earning potential for everyone and richer experience for traders, fostering a thriving ecosystem.
A Bold New Approach to Trading: Dogex is more than a platform — it’s a movement. A vibrant space where beginners arrive for fun and leave as professional traders, armed with modern strategies and AI-powered insights.
Where Trading Meets Joy: Here, trading is not just profit — it’s pleasure. A place to unwind, socialize, and vibe with friends, all while growing your skills without the fear of losses.
Dogex isn’t just another trading app. It’s the future playground for traders who want to learn deeply, trade smartly, and enjoy the journey — together.
Dogex Onboarding Campaign is Live
Prize pool:
$1000 real USDC + secret rewards
Main Prizes:
1st place: $300
2nd place: $200
3rd place: $100
How to Join:
Go to https://doge-ex.com/
Mint USDC for trading
Make at least 3 trades (any result counts)
Follow Us:
Twitter: @MetisL2
Twitter: @mr_wagmi_cto
Twitter: @DogexPerps
Telegram: @dogexperps
Bonus Rewards:
Best PNL or liquidation
Most active trader (volume or number of trades)
Best post about Dogex
Most tweets about Dogex
Special Yeeting Reward (for the real degen)
Share your trading story or leave feedback here:
Forum thread on Dogex
We won’t reveal the exact criteria to avoid manipulation.
We’ll reward the most genuinely active and consistent users.

title: LazAI Bad Data Story Quest
content:
SEP
22
LazAI Story Quest
Public
·
Created by
Sheyda
Mon, Sep 22 5:26 PM → Mon, Oct 6 4:00 AM
4
Misleading Data Breaks AI
AI is only as strong as the data it learns from. Misleading data doesn’t just create mistakes — it breaks trust, breaks outcomes, and breaks AI. On Hyperion with LazAI, we anchor proofs onchain to ensure transparency, reliability, and community ownership.
This 2-week campaign invites you to share your story:
When have you experienced misleading data leading to wrong conclusions, funny outcomes, or serious problems?
What did it teach you about why good data matters?
By sharing your voice, you help show why “Good Data, Good AI — Anchored on Hyperion.”
How to participate?
Just share your story as a reply to this Forum post.
The most valid and interesting story will be selected as the winner.
Rewards
Winner Reward: Lazbubu DAT redeem code
Lazbubu DATs are an exclusive, whitelist-only mint that is now closed. Each Lazbubu is a user-owned AI companion that grows and evolves with your interactions. Owning one is both rare and an early badge of entry into the Hyperion AI era.
Join the Story Quest
“Misleading Data Breaks AI.” Share your story below and help shape a future where AI is anchored on trust.

title: Spotlight Campaign - Orbiting Success: 100 New Faces, One Mission
content:
100 Strong and Growing — A Community Milestone! We’re thrilled to see the Forum inching toward 100 new members, all thanks to the incredible support from this community and the outreach powered by LazaiTrader. To celebrate, here’s what we’re diving into:
1. The Journey – Strategic Growth This momentum is no accident. Our progress has been turbocharged by the unique synergy between gMetis (our parent project) and its powerful partner, the Core Network. Thanks to this collaboration, we’ve been able to leverage Orbit, a Core Network initiative designed to streamline cooperation between Web3 projects and KOLs. And yes—it works. We received verifiable KOL applications within minutes of activation.
2. Fueling Progress – Smart Use of New Funds With a fresh $200 infusion, we’re putting every coin to work in the testing phase of LazaiTrader. Here’s how it rolls:
Each tester gets a dedicated wallet address
Coordinate with your Agent on a preferred trading strategy
Let the Agent take the reins
Top-performing wallet owners will win exclusive prizes
This is just the beginning. Your energy is what’s propelling us forward. Let’s test, trade, and thrive.

title: Experience ALPHA: A New Chapter with Guild
content:
Experience ALPHA: A New Chapter with Guild
The signal has been sent. The Experience ALPHA Campaign is now live on Guild, bringing the Hyperion and Metis communities into the next phase of AI-powered on-chain intelligence.
This campaign is more than a marketing event. It is an open invitation for builders, DAO members, researchers, and community users to interact directly with ALPHA Alith. This AI agent scans Hyperion and Metis in real time, filters noise, and delivers actionable signals.
Why This Campaign Matters
In the Web3 ecosystem, the first to know often becomes the first to act. By surfacing new dApps, DAO proposals, whale activity, liquidity flows, and scam alerts in real time, ALPHA gives its users the timing edge that matters most.
Through the Guild campaign, our goals are clear:
Give the community hands-on access to ALPHA.
**Collect feedback that will refine the AI agent over time. ****
When more people interact with ALPHA, its ability to rank and prioritize signals improves, making it smarter and more useful for the entire ecosystem.
How the Community Benefits
Builders will see opportunities sooner, from integrations to funding calls.
DAO leaders can coordinate on governance with real-time alerts.
Users gain early scam warnings and safer entry into new projects.
Researchers can detect ecosystem patterns without drowning in raw data.
By participating in the campaign, you are not just earning rewards. You are helping shape the intelligence layer that will safeguard Hyperion and Metis as they continue to scale.
Join the Movement
The Experience ALPHA Campaign is live on Guild. Complete the quests, test ALPHA, and share your experience. Every interaction makes ALPHA stronger, and every early signal makes the ecosystem more resilient.
https://era.guild.xyz/alpha-alith
Stay ahead. Stay sharp. Experience ALPHA.

title: Open Letter to the Metis Community: Metis is no longer “just an L2”
content:
Metis is no longer “just an L2”
Prelude
Metis has stayed on one clear course, most recently reaffirmed at ETHDenver on March 6th, 2025. From the beginning, our aim has been consistent: not to be another Layer 2, but to build infrastructure that evolves, experiments, and sets the direction for tomorrow. We began by scaling Ethereum and have steadily expanded toward a future where blockchain and AI move together.
Traditional L2s need upgrading. That is why we built Hyperion, our AI-optimized infrastructure layer that raises throughput and lowers latency. But infrastructure alone is not enough. To bring communities in, we must layer playability and meaningful interactions on top.
LazAI, our application and data layer, is where playability comes alive. It makes infrastructure interactive, aligns with market demand, and builds community confidence.
Metis is the beta ground for new bets, the place where daring ideas are tested, refined, and scaled before they shape the industry at large. As we continue this path, we must grow together, anchored by trust and clarity.
A Toolkit for One Economy: From Settlement to Playability
Metis’s strength is in its unity. We are not scattering value into silos; we are building a connected toolkit under one economy.
Andromeda serves as the settlement and trading layer. Hyperion expands that base with scalable compute, optimized for AI dApps that demand high throughput and low latency. Together, they form the infrastructure. On top sits LazAI, serving as the application layer, transforming this foundation into playability, points, data, and AI-driven value.
Step by step, the toolkit expands. Value builds as the layers connect. Recent milestones show this evolution in motion. Andromeda continues as the battle-tested motherchain. HyperHack drew more than 100 active Hyperion builders. LazAI Testnet launched with Lazbubu proving real playability. Our AI Companion DAT Lazbubu enrolled over 90k participants in the Whitelist Campaign and over 10,000 DAT mints.
Putting Users First in the Journey
Participation begins with simple entry points that spark curiosity. From there, users move into richer experiences where AI, data, and community features make engagement meaningful.
The path is clear. LazAI incubates agents and applications through LazPad, while users earn, mint, and interact with data assets that mature into broader use cases on Andromeda. Lazbubu is the first step, showing how evolving AI Companions can anchor this journey.
These are not static NFTs, but AI agents that evolve over time, transforming innovation into experiences that align with market demand and foster confidence within our community.
Closing
As I shared in a previous letter, our strength comes from trust and clarity. The earlier you take part in these new layers, the more your participation will guide their growth, and over time your efforts may be recognized in ways that matter.
Metis is shaping the beta ground for the next era. With clear paths for participation through LazAI and Lazbubu, and with a culture that dares while staying principled, we are ready for what’s next.
This is not the time to stand still. This is the time to lean in, experiment, and co-create the future.
Together, we will make Metis not just a network but the proving ground where tomorrow’s breakthroughs are born.
— Elena Sinelnikova

title: What makes people want to share?
content:
it usually takes a lot for someone to voluntarily share content spontaneously.
so what actually makes someone click repost?
in my experience, it’s usually one of five things:
• it helps them look smart
• it makes them laugh
• it says what they feel but couldn’t word
• it’s so beautiful they want others to see it
• there’s something in it for them
this goes beyond just “good content”. people share what makes them look good, feel something, or signal their identity.
so when writing for X, think less like a broadcaster and more like a mirror. are you giving your audience something they want to show others?
curious what others have found, what makes you share something?
please, do share

title: Why building in public pays off
content:
Some of the best opportunities come not from what you know, but from what you share.
When you put your work out there:
You get feedback you didn’t expect.
You attract collaborators you didn’t know you needed.
You build confidence by finishing and showing your progress.
Even small projects or rough drafts can spark big conversations. And sometimes, sharing leads to recognition or even rewards.
So if you’ve been sitting on something you’ve built, this is the nudge: share it. Don’t wait until it’s “perfect.” The builders who put themselves out there always end up ahead.

title: Exploring AI x Web3: Key Takeaways from Natalia Ameline’s Chat with David Gokhshtein
content:
I just watched the interview with Natalia Ameline and David Gokhshtein, and it gave me some interesting insights about how AI and Web3 are converging.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kSyep30JCyQ
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q1ImDKVmeZI
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b1wVQbICInQ
One thing that stood out was the idea of AI-optimized Layer 2 solutions, like Hyperion. It got me thinking about how developers could leverage AI to improve scalability and performance without compromising decentralization. For projects focused on AI-native applications, this seems like a practical way to experiment with intelligent, data-driven smart contracts.
Another insight was around dual-chain architectures. Natalia discussed how separating chains for different tasks can empower developers to build more efficient and scalable decentralized apps. This connects to some ongoing discussions here about decentralized sequencers and multi-chain strategies — it seems like a natural evolution for projects struggling with throughput and transaction costs.
I’m curious to hear what others think:
How do you see AI integration shaping the next wave of Web3 projects?
Have any of you experimented with dual-chain or Layer 2 solutions in your apps? What challenges or benefits did you notice?
What are the biggest obstacles for AI-native projects in a decentralized ecosystem — adoption, infrastructure, or something else?
Would love to get your thoughts and experiences — especially if you’re already exploring AI-driven features in your projects.

title: Lurkers to Leaders: How to Grow Contributors from Within
content:
every dev community has a long tail of quiet lurkers. they read, nod along, and learn, but they don’t post, build, or contribute.
but that doesn’t mean they’re not interested. most of the time, they just don’t know where to start.
so how do we create better onramps? how do we turn passive interest into active contribution?
here are a few ideas:
tag beginner-friendly issues clearly
celebrate small contributions too
invite feedback before something is “ready”
and of course interactive initiatives like the lazai chill workshop series are really helpful. it’s relaxed, low-stakes, and designed to meet people where they are. this kind of thing can make someone feel like “hey, maybe i can get involved.”
it’s not about forcing people to step up. it’s about making the first step feel smaller.
questions for you:
→ when did you first go from lurker to contributor?
→ what made it easier, or harder?
→ how can the builders guild do this better?
drop your thoughts. let’s help the next wave of builders feel like they belong here.

title: Experience ALPHA: Launching Our First Guild Campaign
content:
Experience ALPHA: Launching Our First Guild Campaign
The Hyperion and Metis ecosystems are growing faster than ever. Every day brings new dApps, governance proposals, liquidity movements, and wallet activity. This pace is exciting, but it also creates one big challenge: how do you separate the signal from the noise?
That challenge is the reason ALPHA exists.
What is ALPHA?
ALPHA is an AI agent built for Hyperion and Metis. Instead of spamming raw data, it continuously scans the chain in real time, applies AI logic to filter out irrelevant noise, and delivers only the signals that matter.
These include:
New dApp launches and contract deployments
DAO votes and governance activity
Whale and liquidity moves
Early scam and rug pull alerts
In other words, ALPHA is not just another monitoring bot. It is a watchtower for the ecosystem, designed to give communities, builders, and users the timing edge they need to act early and act smart.
Why Launch a Campaign?
Until now, ALPHA has been introduced through articles, discussions, and community conversations. But the best way to understand ALPHA is to experience it directly.
That’s why we are partnering with Guild to launch the Xperience ALPHA Campaign. This campaign gives everyone the chance to interact with the AI agent, explore its signals, and share feedback. It is both an introduction and an invitation to shape how ALPHA evolves.
How to Get Involved
Participation is simple. Through Guild, you will:
Join and interact with ALPHA
Follow the project on X for updates
Share your experience with the community
Complete the listed engagement tasks
Every completed step brings you closer to rewards while also helping the ecosystem test and refine the AI agent.
Why It Matters for the Community
The strength of Hyperion and Metis has always been its community of builders, users, and researchers. By opening ALPHA to direct interaction, we’re creating a shared intelligence layer that benefits everyone, not just insiders. When more people have access to early, reliable signals, the ecosystem as a whole becomes safer, fairer, and stronger.
Join the Campaign
The Experience ALPHA Campaign is now live.
Join here : Alpha Alith
Step into the signal. Filter the noise. Xperience ALPHA!

title: Assignment for Build & Chill workshop - Episode 3
content:
Congratulations on making it to Week 3 of our “Build & Chill” workshop series! This week, you’ll go beyond running queries you’ll integrate the LazAI Data Query into an actual application and showcase how an agent can interact with your dataset in a useful way.
Assignment Requirements
What you need to deliver:
GitHub repository with your working app + documentation
App demo (short Loom video or screenshots showing your app in action)
DAT transaction hash tied to the dataset your app is using
At least one interactive feature powered by LazAI Data Query (e.g., Q&A, summarisation, recommendation, or custom logic)
Brief explanation (2–3 sentences) of your app’s purpose and how it leverages LazAI
Tech Guidelines
Use the Alith SDK (Python, Node.js, or Rust)
Must integrate at least one LazAI Data Query call (inference, data query)
Bonus points if you make the app interactive (CLI, web UI, or chat interface)
